name: Toutatis
description:
A Quadolor Games - Cirrus Studios collaborative project for Global Game Jam 2017

A bunch of space rocks and UFOs have decided to team up to attack and hate on Earth, and it's up to you to protect it! Tappity-tap to create waves to fend them off!

Credits

Program - M.S.T.O.P. (Quadolor Games)
Art, Music - Bernice Wong (Cirrus Studios)
Fonts - Kenney
SFX - unfa (freesound.org)
